Label.en: He packed it full of items like these that he 'acquired' during his empire
Label.fr: Il l'a rempli de pièces 'acquises' durant son règne
Label.es: He packed it full of items like these that he 'acquired' during his empire
Label.zh: He packed it full of items like these that he 'acquired' during his empire

Label.en: If you visit, you'll definitely see some of them!
Label.fr: Si tu visites tu pourras en voir pal mal !
Label.es: If you visit, you'll definitely see some of them!
Label.zh: If you visit, you'll definitely see some of them!

Label.en: But it was actually during the 20th century that the museum became the biggest in the world
Label.fr: Mais c'est en fait au XXe siècle que le musée est devenu le plus grand du monde
Label.es: But it was actually during the 20th century that the museum became the biggest in the world
Label.zh: But it was actually during the 20th century that the museum became the biggest in the world

Label.en: Well, it was actually during the 20th century that the museum became the biggest in the world
Label.fr: Quoi qu'il en soit, c'est en fait au XXe siècle que le musée est devenu le plus grand du monde
Label.es: Well, it was actually during the 20th century that the museum became the biggest in the world
Label.zh: Well, it was actually during the 20th century that the museum became the biggest in the world
